TextLibrary.Text: Sunspear
I have a serious matter I wish to discuss with you.
I have a serious matter I wish to discuss with you.
I have a serious matter I wish to discuss with you.
I have a serious matter I wish to discuss with you.
Sure, Sunspear. What is it?
Sure, Sunspear. What is it?
Sure, Sunspear. What is it?
Sure, Sunspear. What is it?
I am getting old. I fear that I am not much longer for this world.
I am getting old. I fear that I am not much longer for this world.
I am getting old. I fear that I am not much longer for this world.
I am getting old. I fear that I am not much longer for this world.
That's crazy! You're as fit and healthy as any Minotaur I've met.
That's crazy! You're as fit and healthy as any Minotaur I've met.
That's crazy! You're as fit and healthy as any Minotaur I've met.
That's crazy! You're as fit and healthy as any Minotaur I've met.

No, listen to me, being fit and healthy has much to do with this. There is nothing worse for a Minotaur than to pass away of old age. We must die in battle. When you have lived as long as I have, you approach what we call the Age of Honor.

No, listen to me, being fit and healthy has much to do with this. There is nothing worse for a Minotaur than to pass away of old age. We must die in battle. When you have lived as long as I have, you approach what we call the Age of Honor.

No, listen to me, being fit and healthy has much to do with this. There is nothing worse for a Minotaur than to pass away of old age. We must die in battle. When you have lived as long as I have, you approach what we call the Age of Honor.

No, listen to me, being fit and healthy has much to do with this. There is nothing worse for a Minotaur than to pass away of old age. We must die in battle. When you have lived as long as I have, you approach what we call the Age of Honor.
What are you saying?
What are you saying?
What are you saying?
What are you saying?
That the time approaches when I must find a worthy opponent, and fall in battle against them.
That the time approaches when I must find a worthy opponent, and fall in battle against them.
That the time approaches when I must find a worthy opponent, and fall in battle against them.
That the time approaches when I must find a worthy opponent, and fall in battle against them.
That seems so pointless...
That seems so pointless...
That seems so pointless...
That seems so pointless...

We seek honor in death, just as we seek honor in life. Would you rather be remembered as the one who fought bravely against a mighty foe? Or as a senile old man who can no longer remember his own name?

We seek honor in death, just as we seek honor in life. Would you rather be remembered as the one who fought bravely against a mighty foe? Or as a senile old man who can no longer remember his own name?

We seek honor in death, just as we seek honor in life. Would you rather be remembered as the one who fought bravely against a mighty foe? Or as a senile old woman who can no longer remember her own name?

We seek honor in death, just as we seek honor in life. Would you rather be remembered as the one who fought bravely against a mighty foe? Or as a senile old woman who can no longer remember her own name?
If that's what you really want. You've been a good friend to me and I wish to be the same to you.
If that's what you really want. You've been a good friend to me and I wish to be the same to you.
If that's what you really want. You've been a good friend to me and I wish to be the same to you.
If that's what you really want. You've been a good friend to me and I wish to be the same to you.
Thank you. Now, I wish to travel to Giants' Walk and watch you fight one of those Frost Giants. If it seems a worthy foe, then I shall stage my final battle against one of their kin.
Thank you. Now, I wish to travel to Giants' Walk and watch you fight one of those Frost Giants. If it seems a worthy foe, then I shall stage my final battle against one of their kin.
